definition: to find a place for/to help settle down/to arrange for/to get into bed/placement
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: The residents were resettled and church services were held in the Convent.
sentences.chinese: 居民被重新安置和教會服務，被關押在女修道院。

sentences.english: Refugees from Messina were relocated to cities throughout Italy.
sentences.chinese: 墨西拿難民被重新安置在意大利境內其它城市。

sentences.english: They placed dirt and rocks in a pan and then filled it about half way with water.
sentences.chinese: 他們在平底鍋安置了土和岩石然後填裝了一半。

sentences.english: A workbench is set up to assemble analog cameras in the Leica assembly room.
sentences.chinese: 在徠卡的裝配車間裏，安置着組裝類似相機的工作臺。

sentences.english: What is the installation elevation of this pipeline?
sentences.chinese: 這條管線的安置標高是多少？

sentences.english: Or ever I was aware, my soul made me like the chariots of Amminadib.
sentences.chinese: 不知不覺，我的心將我安置在我尊長的車中。

sentences.english: It is ideal for keeping in the living room.
sentences.chinese: 客廳是其理想的安置地。

sentences.english: The world seemed very small - there was no place for me and my little roll of bedding.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得世界很小，沒有安置我與我的小鋪蓋卷的地方。

sentences.english: The placement of dollies on carrier pallets can also easily be carried out after the palletizing process.
sentences.chinese: 安置承運人托盤推車上也可以輕易地進行後碼垛進程。

sentences.english: She was receiving treatment in Huaxi Hospital in Chengdu. Her conditions were not immediately available.
sentences.chinese: 她被安置在成都華西醫院治療，傷情目前還不清楚。

sentences.english: Bogey tablets placed in the top of Road.
sentences.chinese: 神位忌安置在道的上方。

sentences.english: The villagers whose cottages are destroyed by the floods have to be relocated immediately.
sentences.chinese: 房舍被洪水沖壞的村民必須立即被安置到其他地方。

sentences.english: Other similar steel statues are already in place in Chicago and Santa Clara, California.
sentences.chinese: 其他類似的鋼像也已經安置在芝加哥與聖克拉拉。

sentences.english: Releases and resettlements are now happening more quickly.
sentences.chinese: 釋放和重新安置的步伐已經加快。

sentences.english: It is a famous temple in China. It was built in ancient times to house the fingerbones of Sakyamuni, the founder of Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 它是我國古代安置釋迦牟尼佛骨舍利的著名寺院。

sentences.english: This vending machine is provided by a food company from the UnitedKingdom.
sentences.chinese: 人工售貨機是由英國的一家食品公司安置在這裏的。

definition: to set sth aside/to let sth lie idle/idle/unused
to reside/to dwell/to live in a place/resident in
to provide a place to stay/to house/to accommodate/(of an institution etc) to take in/to accept
to distribute/to assign/to allocate/to partition (a hard drive)
to stay behind to take care of things
to tear down/to demolish/to dismantle/to remove
to assign (a task to different people)/to allocate
